hasAttributes.name: adjustmentAmount
hasAttributes.description:
"Reference number on shipping document
(company reference or logistics company
identifier)."

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentDescription
hasAttributes.description:
"If an adjustment to the receipt, a description
of the reason for the adjustment."

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentIndicator
hasAttributes.description:
"""0"" if the transaction is the original shipment
transaction, ""1"" if the transaction is a
shipment adjustment."

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedByDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The DateTime the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDateTime
hasAttributes.description:
"The date the transaction was entered into the 
system. This is sometimes referred to as the 
creation date. This should be a system-
generated date (rather than user-entered
 date), when possible. This date does not 
necessarily correspond with the date of the
 transaction itself."

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedAmount
hasAttributes.description:
"Customer purchasing the product. Must 
match a Customer_Account_ID in the
 Customer_Master_Listing_YYYYMMDD file."

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description:
"Monetary amount for the line item in the
 receipt document related to the purchase 
order in local currency."

hasAttributes.name: lineCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description:
"The currency for local reporting
 requirements. See ISO 4217 coding."

hasAttributes.name: lineExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description:
"Monetary amount for the line item in the
purchase order related to the receipt
shipping document in local currency. If no
purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description:
"The currency for local reporting
requirements. See ISO 4217 coding. If no
purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderLineId
hasAttributes.description:
"Identifier for purchase order line number.
Must match Purchase_Order_Line_ID
used in
Purchase_Orders_Lines_YYYYMMDD_
YYYYMMDD file. If no purchase order,
leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderQuantity
hasAttributes.description:
"Purchase order line quantity. If no purchase 
order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderUnitofMeasure
hasAttributes.description:
"Purchase order line base unit of measure. If
 no purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description:
"Purchase order line price per unit. If no 
purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptDocumentLineId
hasAttributes.description: Reference line number on receipt document.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each shipment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each shipment.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductBarCode
hasAttributes.description: UPC or other general identifier.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductDescription
hasAttributes.description: Product description (plain English) to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the product.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #1, for example, tires or accessories.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #2, for example, brand.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each product.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Item quantity received.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Base unit of measure.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Price per unit for item received.

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description:
"Status of the transaction's posting to the GL
(for example, ""Posted,"" ""Not Posted"")."

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description:
"Transaction monetary amount in local
currency. If no purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description:
"The currency for local reporting
requirements. See ISO 4217 coding. If no
purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderId
hasAttributes.description:
"Unique identifier for each purchase order.
Must match Purchase_Order_ID in the
Purchase_Orders_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMMD
D file. If no purchase order, leave blank."

hasAttributes.name: receiptDate
hasAttributes.description: Date of receipt (date received)

hasAttributes.name: receiptDocumentId
hasAttributes.description:
"Reference number on receipt shipping
document (company reference or logistics
company identifier)."

hasAttributes.name: receiptFiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the Receipt_Date occursâ€”YYYY for delimited, CCYY-MM-DD fiscal year end (ISO 8601) for extensible business reporting language global ledger taxonomy framework (XBRL GL).

hasAttributes.name: receiptId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: receiptPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the Receipt_Date occurs. Examples include W1â€“W53 for weekly periods, M1â€“M12 for monthly periods, and Q1â€“Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description:
"Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on."

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description:
"Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on."

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description:
"Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on."

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description:
"Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on."

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description:
"Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on."

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description:
"Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is
due or from whom unused credits have been
applied. Must match the
Supplier_Account_ID in the
Supplier_Listing_YYYYMMDD file."
